ch0169_00_aloe/0101_0701_01_10:
Welcome, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s good to see you looking well!
ch0169_00_aloe/0101_0701_02_10:
Have fun adventuring again today with the partner
Pokémon you’ve so lovingly raised!
ch0169_00_aloe/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m the director of Nacrene Museum. We have
fossil and meteorite specimens there.
ch0169_00_aloe/7101_0701_02_10:
Our prize specimen is the skeleton of a
Dragon-type Pokémon.
ch0169_00_aloe/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s in excellent condition—and an impressive sight.
You should take a look sometime.
ch0169_00_aloe/7102_0701_01_10: Say, did you know? Bones can talk!
ch0169_00_aloe/7102_0701_02_10:
They have so much to teach us—not just what they
looked like when they were alive, but even things
about the era and environment they’re from.
ch0169_00_aloe/7102_0701_03_10:
They’re trying to tell us something even as
they sleep.
ch0169_00_aloe/7103_0701_02_10:
and he helped me out by running the museum
when I was busy with my Gym Leader duties.
ch0169_00_aloe/7103_0701_03_10:
He’s a bit timid, but he really does support me.
I’m truly grateful.
ch0169_00_aloe/7104_0701_01_10:
Apparently the island of Pasio was built with soil
gathered from a variety of regions.
ch0169_00_aloe/7104_0701_02_10:
The chance of finding fossils or bones here is low,
but it’s not zero!
ch0169_00_aloe/7104_0701_03_10: It could be interesting to investigate!
ch0169_00_aloe/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You a fan
of riddles?
ch0169_00_aloe/7105_0701_02_10:
Making up riddles is a hobby of mine. It helps
keep my mind sharp—I recommend it!
ch0169_00_aloe/7105_0701_03_10:
Plus, I’d love to hear what sorts of riddles you
think up!
ch0169_00_aloe/7105_0701_04_10:
You seem like you’d come up with really
interesting ones.
ch0169_00_aloe/7105_0701_05_10: Come tell me if you think of anything good!
ch0169_00_aloe/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, there you are! I’ve been looking for you!
ch0169_00_aloe/1701_0701_02_10:
I’ve been meaning to give this to you!
Please, take it!
ch0169_00_aloe/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure it’ll be useful, if you master the timing.
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0701_01_10:
When I was little, my dad worked in a mine, and
he would always bring home bones he dug up.
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0701_02_10:
I was just a child, but I was brought under the
spell of bones.
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0701_03_10:
What did the bones look like when they were part
of a living being?
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0701_04_10: Why are they shaped the way they are?
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0702_01_10:
Dad used to laugh and say that bones and fossils
weren’t worth any money.
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0702_02_10: But now they support my family!
ch0169_00_aloe/2501_0702_03_10:
Just goes to show that the value of things changes
with the times.
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0701_01_10:
There must be something you enjoy, like I do bones
and fossils, right?
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0701_02_10: It’s OK if you can’t think of anything right now.
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0701_03_10:
One day, when you find something you love,
make sure you trust that feeling!
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0701_04_10:
And even if your feelings change, just keep
following your passion!
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s up to us adults to ensure kids can follow their
passions and dreams without worrying what
they’re worth.
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0702_02_10:
So remember, you can always depend on me!
No need to hesitate!
ch0169_00_aloe/2511_0702_03_10: Come talk to me whenever you’re in trouble!
ch0169_00_aloe/3001_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten yet? A hearty breakfast always
gets me energized to start my day!
ch0169_00_aloe/3003_0701_01_10:
I really love thinking up riddles! They’re an
excellent way to give your brain some exercise!
ch0169_00_aloe/3005_0701_01_10:
I like to get a good night’s rest. Sleeping helps to
heal and strengthen the bones, you know!
